import React from "react" import logo from "../../components/assets/images/logo.png" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import AuthService from "../../components/Autentification/authservice" import Logout from "../../components/Autentification/logout" // Import your Logout component const Search = ({ CartItem }) => { // fixed Header window.addEventListener("scroll", function () { const search = document.querySelector(".search") search.classList.toggle("active", window.scrollY > 100) }) const isAuth = AuthService.checkAuthStatus(); const isAdmin = AuthService.isAdmin(); return ( <>
All Category
{isAuth && !isAdmin && (
)}
{CartItem.length === 0 ? "0" : CartItem.length}
) } export default Search
